Package ui.framework.states

Class MenuInventorySharedState

  • java.lang.Object
    • ui.framework.states.MenuInventorySharedState
  • public class MenuInventorySharedState
extends java.lang.Object
    Maintains shared state for menu and inventory management. This includes cart entries, menu items, and the selected menu item.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      MenuInventorySharedState()
      Constructs a MenuInventorySharedState instance with default values.

    • Method Summary

      Retrieves the list of menu items available.

      Retrieves the order number (ID) currently being processed.

      Retrieves the currently selected menu item.

    • Constructor Detail

      • MenuInventorySharedState

        public MenuInventorySharedState()
        Constructs a MenuInventorySharedState instance with default values. Initializes cart and menu lists as empty and sets selectedMenuItem to null.

    • Method Detail

      • getCartDisplayList

        public java.util.List<CartEntry> getCartDisplayList()
        Retrieves the list of cart entries.
        Returns:
        A list of CartEntry objects currently in the cart.

      • getMenuItems

        public java.util.List<MenuItem> getMenuItems()
        Retrieves the list of menu items available.
        Returns:
        A list of MenuItem objects.

      • getSelectedMenuItem

        public MenuItem getSelectedMenuItem()
        Retrieves the currently selected menu item.
        Returns:
        The selected MenuItem, or null if none is selected.

      • getCashier

        public Cashier getCashier()
                   throws java.lang.NullPointerException
        Retrieves the cashier.
        Returns:
        The cashier object
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if the cashier reference is not set yet

      • getOrderNumberReferenece

        public SharedStateVarWrapper<java.lang.Integer> getOrderNumberReferenece()
        Retrieves the order number (ID) currently being processed.
        Returns:
        The reference to the order ID number

        public void setCart​(java.util.List<CartEntry> cartDisplayList)
        Sets the cart display list.
        Parameters:
        cartDisplayList - A list of CartEntry objects representing the cart.

      • setMenuItems

        public void setMenuItems​(java.util.List<MenuItem> menuItems)
        Sets the list of menu items.
        Parameters:
        menuItems - A list of MenuItem objects representing available menu items.

      • setSelectedMenuItem

        public void setSelectedMenuItem​(MenuItem selectedMenuItem)
        Sets the currently selected menu item.
        Parameters:
        selectedMenuItem - The MenuItem to be marked as selected.
